scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.pack:declgen: rimraf bundle && mkdir bundle && npm pack --pack-destination bundle
scripts.pretest: npm run fix && npm run eslint-check
scripts.test_main: npm run compile && rimraf test/results && node build/src/TestRunner.js test
scripts.fix: npm run prettier-fix && npm run eslint-fix
scripts.test: npm run compile && TEST_OUT=build/test_artifacts && rimraf ${TEST_OUT} && node build/src/TestRunner.js --testDirPath test/ -t cookbook_tests --testOutPath ${TEST_OUT}
